OOC: Well I need that Ender do something so I'll post with it.

BIC:

Ender/Shivah:

"Well Commander Killfest"said Shivah "Altought we have a plan we need 
bots to do it... so we need to do some alliances" Shivah Opened his 
comm link to Ender"Shivah to ender do you copy?"

"Yes "answered Ender "What do you want Shivah?"

"I want that you find out how many factions are in this planet and 
all information that you can get about them... Even Maximals and 
neutrals" said the male "I want that information in three hours"


"Three hours?"Said surpriced Ender "I need..."

"Three HOURS!!!"said Shivah "We haven't time and that's all that I'll 
give you!!!"

Shivah close the comm link while Ender walked towards the computer 
room in order to search that information





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: I'll be gone for two weeks.  Stuff.  Ack.  Most of my 
characters aren't 
> doing anything right now.  I'm leaving Dragoon with Legendary 
Nemasis.  And 
> Airly can use Ender if she needs or wants to.
> 
> ::Dragoon::
>        He finds his arch on his own.  He walks in and looks 
around.  "Hey!  
> We've got spectators?  Let's give 'em a show."  He starts moving 
aimlessly 
> around the room letting minute amounts of energy out of his 
fingertips, 
> creating, in essence, a light show.
